title: Environmental_Resource_Consumption_and_Service_Demand_Analysis
name: Environmental Resource Consumption and Service Demand Analysis in Melbourne (2023)
description: Comprehensive analysis of service request trends and environmental resource consumption in Melbourne. This project includes data cleaning, exploratory data analysis, suburb-specific trends, seasonal pattern analysis, correlation studies, and actionable recommendations for efficient resource management.

datasets.name: Customer Service Requests Dataset
datasets.description: Data on public service requests including resolution times, categories, and geographic information.

datasets.name: Environmental Resources Consumed Dataset
datasets.description: Details of environmental resource usage including electricity, fuel, and greenhouse gas emissions.

datasets.name: Planned Capital Works Dataset
datasets.description: Data on planned infrastructure projects with funding sources and expenditure types.

key_features: Data Cleaning and Preprocessing: Ensured consistency across datasets and handled missing or inconsistent values.
Seasonal Trends Analysis: Identified peak periods for service requests to inform resource allocation.
Suburb-Specific Trends: Analyzed and visualized the geographic distribution of service requests across suburbs.
Correlation Analysis: Investigated relationships between service requests, resource usage, and planned works.
Actionable Recommendations: Provided insights on resource optimization and strategic urban planning.
